name: Gravity Blocks
description:
Description

Gravity Blocks is a connect-four style puzzle game where players must drop differently coloured blocks into a grid in an effort to connect them up and destroy them to gain score.

The exciting twist is that some blocks contain rotation sigils which will flip gravity when they are destroyed, which will cause all blocks to plummet to the new bottom – potentially resulting in more connections triggering!

Try to beat the highscore and share your results in the comments!

Controls

Use left-click to drop a block into the clicked column and to navigate the menus.

Credits
